## PopulatableBeraBorrow.liquidateUpTo() method

Liquidate the least collateralized Troves up to a maximum number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate: number): Promise<PopulatedBeraBorrowTransaction<P, SentBeraBorrowTransaction<S, BeraBorrowReceipt<R, LiquidationDetails>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate | number | Stop after liquidating this many Troves. |
